price: (177) But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.
arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمۡ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nazala bisāḥatihim fasāa ṣabāḥu al-mundharīna
